body_html:
Rebased and addressed comments. Main changes were:

  • rebasing to work with the new aten autograd
  • added reference functions for all NLLLoss (1d/2d, reduce and no reduce) test cases
  • replacing slow get/set tensor functions with faster equivalents
  • supporting TH_INDEX_BASE for consistency
body_text:
Rebased and addressed comments. Main changes were:

rebasing to work with the new aten autograd
added reference functions for all NLLLoss (1d/2d, reduce and no reduce) test cases
replacing slow get/set tensor functions with faster equivalents
supporting TH_INDEX_BASE for consistency
body:
Rebased and addressed comments. Main changes were: 
- rebasing to work with the new aten autograd
- added reference functions for all NLLLoss (1d/2d, reduce and no reduce) test cases
- replacing slow get/set tensor functions with faster equivalents
- supporting TH_INDEX_BASE for consistency
